text.p: Turtle Queen - (bult 1987) 146,000 dwt del Japan end Oct trip via Dalrymple Bay redel South Korea $8,500 daily Korea Line.
Bestore - (built 1993) 70,182 dwt 13.5 on 27 plus one del Japan 6-10/10 three to five months $8,100 daily Shinwa.
China Joy - (built 1994) 70,000 dwt 14.4 on 32.8 plus 1.7 del South Africa mid Oct trip Continent approx. $4,000 daily plus $80,000 bb Safmarine.
Samsun Spirit - (built 1983) 67,368 dwt dwt del Nopac mid Oct trip Far East $7,300 daily plus $135,000 bb Chinese charterers.
Caribbean Sky - (built 1989) 64,282 dwt 14 on 33 plus 2.5 del Japan mid Oct three to five months $7,250 daily Seatrans.
El Hadjar - (built 1981) 64,282 dwt del USG 16-24/10 trip Skaw-Passero $6,000 daily plus $80,000 bb Cereol.
TBN 45,000 dwt del Kalimantan mid Oct trip Japan $8,000 daily plus bb NYK.
Pearl Luck - (built 1977) 35,224 dwt del South Africa mid Oct trip USG $6,000 daily MCL.
